Package marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.pitch

Pitch and voicing analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.
Pitch detection does not work properly.
Therefore, we use HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer for maximum frequency of voicing dteection only and get the f0 values from another pitch detector.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HarmonicPitchTracker This pitch tracker is based on QuatieriÂ´s book
HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer Initial pitch, voicing, maximum frequency of voicing, and refined pitch estimation as described in: Y.
HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzerParams A class for maximum frequency of voicing, f0, and voicing analysis for HNMs
VoicingAnalysisOutputData  
 

Package marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis.pitch Description

Pitch and voicing analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.
Pitch detection does not work properly.
Therefore, we use HnmPitchVoicingAnalyzer for maximum frequency of voicing dteection only and get the f0 values from another pitch detector.
